channel.title: 2 easy to answer (for a good coder, anyways) questions
channel.description:
Ok guys. I just got some questions. Cuz.. I r nub kodar.
1) Why don't certain helms, like dragon full helms, and helms of neitiznot wont work, no matter what I do?
I know i've done it right (putting in the codes for helm spot), but they just don't work. Does this have something to do with a boolean or something?
2) Dark bow attacks LIKE a bow, unless I don't have arrows. If I don't have arrows, it attacks like a sword. I know this SHOULD be an easy fix, but like I said, I r nub kodar.
Thanks in advance, guys :) I really appreciate it.

item.title: 2 easy to answer (for a good coder, anyways) questions

item.description:
@Morgarath wrote:

Ah yes, this one Thank - you.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 18, 2008, 01:13:05 PM[/size][hr]Ok, well, it didn’t help.

Read full topic
